title: Inquiry About an Incoming Wire Transfer
description: A customer is expecting an incoming wire transfer and wants to know if it has arrived.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their account.
Search for recent incoming wire transfers to the customer's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent searches the system but finds no matching incoming wire transfer yet.

tasks.description: Inform the customer that the wire has not yet been received and explain typical processing times.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates that the funds are not yet available and provides an estimated timeframe.
